archimate:BusinessProcess.name: Develop Algorithmic Product Offering Pricing Matrix Cells
archimate:BusinessProcess.documentation:
Brief Description Define the content of the product offering pricing matrix cells. Extended Description Develop Algorithmic Product Offering Pricing Matrix Cells defines the content of the product offering pricing matrix cells.
The cells represent the values for the product features/properties, such as excess data usage rates, product offering prices that will be charged/allowed, and values for algorithmic evaluation such as student, normal, or very important person (VIP) types of customers.
Note that features/properties are also known as characteristic specification values.
